mapper.select:
SELECT NC.id, NC.lastUpdateDate, NC.lastUpdateUserId, NC.name, NC.type, NC.topicId, NC.topicType, NC.createDate, NC.createUserId, NC.parentId, NC.remark FROM NOTE_NOTEPAD_CATALOG NC WHERE
AND NC.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTE_NOTEPAD_CATALOG ( id, lastUpdateDate, lastUpdateUserId, name, type, topicId, topicType, createDate, createUserId, parentId, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{lastUpdateUserId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{topicId}, #{topicType}, #{createDate}, #{createUserId}, #{parentId}, #{remark} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM NOTE_NOTEPAD_CATALOG WHERE
AND id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE NOTE_NOTEPAD_CATALOG
lastUpdateDate = #{lastUpdateDate,javaType=java.util.Date},
lastUpdateUserId = #{lastUpdateUserId,javaType=java.lang.String},
name = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
type = #{type,javaType=com.tx.local.notepad.model.NotepadTypeEnum},
topicId = #{topicId,javaType=java.lang.String},
topicType = #{topicType,javaType=com.tx.local.notepad.model.NotepadTopicTypeEnum},
parentId = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
remark = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE
AND id = #{id}
